Text: Very kind of you J, thanks a lot!!

A great book people would be interested in reading would be the book, Basic Training For Revolutionaries. It was once in hard copy format and then it was banned. You can read more about it here.

http://www.realoathkeepers.org/join/basic-training/

The book also includes quotes from: 
Joseph Story, Samuel Adams, Thomas Jefferson, Patrick Henry, John Adams, Benjamin Franklin, Bruce Lee, Mark Twain, John Ruskin, 
Machiavelli, George Orwell, Sun Tzu, Aristotle, 
George Santayana, Thomas Paine, James Allan, 
George Washington, Sir Thomas Brown, General George S. Patton, Archilochus, General Douglas MacArthur,  Gaius Sallustius Crispus, Hunter B. Armstrong, General Creighton W. Abrams, Carlos Castenada, Ulysses S. Grant,
James Madison,  and many more.

I forgot to add, It is also good for Soldiers, Recruits, Law Enforcement, Patriots, Revolutionaries and all others.  It is also free to download.   Well thanks a lot for the  show.  Have a good day and week everyone.
